lcn.p: Then there are the Martial Arts Blockheads. They determine Jedi training in a manner that equates the Jedi path exclusively with Martial Arts. This is clearly a deviation from the Jedi Path because, while Martial Arts is in fact an area of the Jedi Arts that no Jedi should squander an opportunity to train in, it is niether the sole area of the Jedi Arts nor the core of the Jedi path. Needless to say - one who studies the Martial Arts to the exclusion of all else, especially to the exclusion of the Jedi Code, is no Jedi at all.

Also, while Martial Arts is an area of the Jedi Arts that the Jedi Code forbids us to willfully neglect, it is a distortion of the Jedi Code to censure or to diminish those who are lacking in their Martial Arts training for wont of adequate opportunity.
